description: Maps the behavior labels to the corresponding detection type (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/infra/safetyeventtriagemodels/detection_util.go)

schema.name: behavior_label
schema.description: The numerical value for a behavior label

schema.name: behavior_label_type
schema.description: The name of the behavior label (e.g., 'Speeding', 'HarshTurn', 'MobileUsage', 'ForwardCollisionWarning', etc.)

schema.name: detection_type
schema.description: The ID of the detection type

schema.name: detection_type_name
schema.description: The name of the detection type
